name: HH_PAT_ENC
description: This table contains Home Care overtime single items that are stored in the Patient (EPT) master file.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: Unique identifier for this contact for this patient.

columns.name: CHIEF_COMPLAINT_ID
columns.description: Identifier for chief complaint for the encounter.

columns.name: HH_TYPE_OF_SVC_C_NAME
columns.description: Home Health type of service category list selections for the encounter.  Links to category table ZC_HH_TYPE_OF_SVC.

columns.name: HH_CONTACT_TYPE_ID
columns.description: Identifier for the Home Health contact type for the encounter.

columns.name: HH_ENC_CREAT_INST
columns.description: Instant of creation for the encounter.

columns.name: HH_VST_CHRG_UCLID
columns.description: The Universal Charge Line record ID for the visit change for this encounter.

columns.name: HH_ASMT_CHRG_UCLID
columns.description: The Universal Charge Line record ID for the assessment change for this encounter.

columns.name: INPAT_DISCHRG_DT
columns.description: Inpatient discharge date.

columns.name: PRIMARY_DX_ID
columns.description: Identifier for the ICD-9 primary diagnosis. Links to table CLARITY_EDG.

columns.name: PRIM_DX_START_DATE
columns.description: Primary diagnosis start date.

columns.name: PRIM_DX_SEVERITY
columns.description: Primary diagnosis severity.

columns.name: PROGNOSIS_C_NAME
columns.description: Prognosis category list selections.  Links to category table ZC_PROGNOSIS.

columns.name: REHAB_POTENTIAL_C_NAME
columns.description: Rehab potential category list selections.  Links to category table ZC_REHAB_POTENTIAL.

columns.name: POC_FLAG_YN
columns.description: Is there a plan of care?  Yes or no.

columns.name: POC_HDR_ID
columns.description: Text entered for plan of care header.

columns.name: CERT_PER_STRT_DT
columns.description: Cert period start date.

columns.name: CERT_PERIOD_END_DT
columns.description: Cert period end date.

columns.name: POC_VERBAL_ORD_ID
columns.description: Identifier for the plan of care verbal order. Links to table HH_VO_INFO.

columns.name: POC_GOALS_ID
columns.description: Identifier for the plan of care goals.

columns.name: POC_ORDERS_ID
columns.description: Identifier for the plan of care orders.

columns.name: IS_BILLABLE_YN
columns.description: Whether the encounter is billable.

columns.name: EOW_LINK_CT_ID
columns.description: The record ID of a message in the In Basket task and messaging system. Links to table IB_MESSAGES.

columns.name: SCHED_TM_TBD
columns.description: Schedule time to be determined.

columns.name: OASIS_DATA_LINK_ID
columns.description: Numeric link to an OASIS data set.

columns.name: ROC_DATE
columns.description: Resumption of care assessment date.

columns.name: DISCHARGE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: Discharge reason category list selection.  Links to category table ZC_REASON_DISCH.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is populated only if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: STATED_WEIGHT
columns.description: The stated weight entered for a patient during an encounter.

columns.name: HC_ADM_DECISION_YN
columns.description: This item contains the home care admission decision.

columns.name: IP_PROC_NA_YN
columns.description: This item stores whether the "NA - Not Applicable" check box is checked for Home Health OASIS question M1012.

columns.name: IP_PROC_UKNWN_YN
columns.description: This item stores whether the "UK - Unknown" check box is checked for Home Health OASIS question M1012 - Inpatient Procedures.

columns.name: REGIMEN_CHG_NA_YN
columns.description: This item stores whether the "NA - Not Applicable" check box is checked for Home Health OASIS question M1016.

columns.name: POC_PHYS_ID
columns.description: This item stores responses to question M0018 on Home Health OASIS assessments. M0018 holds the NPI of the physician who is expected to sign the home health patient's plan of care. This item stores the record ID of the physician, not the NPI.

columns.name: POC_PHYS_NA_YN
columns.description: This item stores whether the Unknown checkbox is checked on Home Health OASIS question M0018.

columns.name: POC_VERBAL_SOC
columns.description: This field holds the clinician who received the verbal start of care order and the date the order was received.

columns.name: POC_F2F_HNO_ID
columns.description: HH Face to Face attestation note for the plan of care

columns.name: PRIM_DX_FLAG_C_NAME
columns.description: The Primary DX - Flag item is a customer defined category list that can be used to further describe a diagnosis entry. An example of the use of this item would be for flagging a diagnosis as an exacerbation or onset. The flag will be carried over to the plan of care

columns.name: VISIT_START_DTTM
columns.description: The start time and date of a home visit.

columns.name: VISIT_END_DTTM
columns.description: The end time and date of a home visit.

columns.name: HH_EPS_CHRG_UCL_ID
columns.description: The Universal Charge Line record ID for the EPS Assessment charge for NY Medicaid.

columns.name: POC_PHYS_EST_HNO_ID
columns.description: This stores a link to the note that stores Home Health's physician recertification estimate attestation statement for the Plan of Care verbal order.

columns.name: SOC_DATE
columns.description: If this is a start of care contact, this is the M0030 date.

columns.name: VOL_DRIVING_ST_TM
columns.description: The driving start time for a home health or hospice volunteer visit.

columns.name: VOL_DRIVING_END_TM
columns.description: The driving end time for a home health or hospice volunteer visit.

columns.name: VOL_MILEAGE
columns.description: The mileage for driving to a home health or hospice volunteer visit.

columns.name: VOL_NAME
columns.description: The volunteer's name for a home health or hospice volunteer visit.

columns.name: TRANSCRIBE_USER_ID
columns.description: The transcribing user for a home health or hospice volunteer visit.

columns.name: TRANSCRIBE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: HH_POC_PHYS_ADDR_ID
columns.description: This item stores the unique address ID corresponding to M0018 provider (attending physician) who is expected to sign the Home Health patient's Plan of Care.

columns.name: POC_SUBMIT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the POC submission instant in UTC when the POC was submitted.

columns.name: DECEASED_BEFORE_YN
columns.description: This item determines if the patient was deceased before the visit. If this is set to Yes, the whole visit will be considered as post-mortem visit.

columns.name: NO_SECONDARY_DX_C_NAME
columns.description: Whether the patient has a secondary diagnoses.

columns.name: ENC_CLOSE_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description: The encounter close method category ID for the encounter.
entries: Automatically closed due to incorrect time zone

columns.name: REPORTING_DISC_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the reporting discipline of the provider who completed the encounter.

columns.name: POC_MENTAL_NOTE_ID
columns.description: This stores a link to the note that stores the mental, psychosocial, and cognitive observations for the Plan of Care verbal order.

columns.name: HH_HSPC_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The ID of the first home health/hospice episode to which the encounter is linked.
